reviews.review_msg: Real funny prof, knows a lot about everyday things that can kill you. She's one of the most engaging profs I have met and makes people want to participate for more than just marks. Assignments tend to be papers and presentations...she a professional presenter so no reading off the slides. Gotta know your stuff! Pretty easy grader if you work
Great teacher, super smart and passionate about what she is teaching. Her first time teaching this class and she did a great job:)
